Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 29 May 2019Hi Anon!Let me do my best to answer you below.We hope to become something like the TripAdvisor for Personal Finance in SEA, starting here in Singapore. A giant knowledge base and one-stop of all things personal finance related.There are many online advertising models we could adopt (CPM, CPC, CPA), but for us now, it's to become Singapore's largest crowd-sourced knowledge center for all things personal finance realted, and I do hope that we're on the way there.Not really rocket science!To get a better understanding of this concept, do jump in and check out:Seedly QnA: https://seedly.sg/questionsSeedly Reviews: https://seedly.sg/reviewsYou can access our other tools and resource guides:Seedly Mobile App: https://get.seedly.sg/appSeedly Blog: https://blog.seedly.sg0 comments4
